rename.from: Query: incorrect results for complex predicate with & operation
rename.to: Query: incorrect results for complex predicate with bitwise AND operation with bool args

body:
problem is IsNull checks on bitwise operations with bool values are not handled correctly. On database those ops behave like regular binary, meaning if any of the values is null the result is also null. However on C# those ops behave like AndAlso/OrElse, meaning `NULL & false` returns `false`, `NULL | true` returns `true`. We can either provide proper expansions for IsNull/IsNotNull or try normalize bitwise on bool arguments into AndAlso/OrElse.

Expansions look like this:

```cs
a & b == null -> (a == null && b == null) || (a == null && b == true) || (a == true && b == null)
a | b == null -> (a == null && b == null) || (a == null && b == false) || (a == false && b == null)
a & b != null -> (a != null && b != null) || (a == null && b == false) || (a == false && b == null)
a | b != null -> (a != null && b != null) || (a == true && b == null) || (a = null && b == true)
```

@maumar considering that the semantics for C# logical and conditional Boolean operators matches for expressions that have no side-effects, I think that for the SQL target it would be possible to always translate them as if they were conditional Boolean operators in SQL.
Do you foresee any major issue with this approach?

issue.title: Translate logical Boolean operators as conditional Boolean operators

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
In C# the expected results of logical Boolean operators are the same as those of the conditional Boolean operators (they differ in not being short-circuited); see [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/operators/boolean-logical-operators#nullable-boolean-logical-operators).

Instead, in SQL logical operators propagate NULLs. It is possible to avoid complex translations by simply mapping the logical operators to the corresponding conditional ones for Boolean expressions.

Fixes #30245.

body:
I went forward and tried it out in
 - #33873
